name: macdows 95
description:
macdows 95 is an absurd puzzle game based on an imaginary operating system. The main purpose of the game is to fulfill these absurd tasks. On the other hand, when solving puzzles, someone communicates with you from a secret spot.Key Features25 different puzzles
A heart-warming story
Relaxing music & sounds
100% indie - designed and developed by Yunus AyyildizEssentialsa keyboard
a mouse
a working brain
